condition.title: Location Check
condition.description: Checks the current location against location criteria. Requires origin provided by loot context, and always fails if not provided.

offsetX.title: Offset X
offsetX.description: An optional x offset to the location.

offsetY.title: Offset Y
offsetY.description: An optional y offset to the location.

offsetZ.title: Offset Z
offsetZ.description: An optional z offset to the location.

predicate.title: Predicate
predicate.description: Predicate applied to location, uses same structure as advancements.
